name: bit-manipulation
author: Joakim L. Christiansen (https://joakimch.github.io)
description: An ES module providing functions for setting and clearing bits (and doing any bitwise operations) in Numbers up to 53 bits and in BigInts of any bit-width. In addition there's also functions to manipulate the bits in JavaScript's 64-bit floats and representing integers (in two's complement format) in binary or hex.
